title: Button, late 18th century
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description:
One circular medallion in the style of Wedgwood Jasperware; ornamented with anthemion-like form alternating with three-leaved form set within scrolls; white on blue ground; Central hole.

On card 4

tombstone.epitaph:
Button, late 18th century.
late 18th century. Stoneware. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1925-2-7-a.
